flawed_nl_solution:
He runs at 0.1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=0.1>>0.1
While the album is playing he can run 4.0 miles because 40 x 0.1 = <<40*0.1=4.0>>4.0
He has to run 4.0 miles without the album because 6 - 4.0 = <<6-4.0=4.0>>4.0
Without music he runs 4/60 miles per minute because 4 / 60 = 4/60
He will run the remaining 4.0 miles in 60.0 minutes because 4.0 / (4/60) = <<4.0/(4/60)=60.0>>60.0
It will take him 100.0 minutes in total because 40 + 60.0 =<<40+60.0=100.0>>100.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2.0, not 4.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
